context: yes I have windows 8.1 this will not work
response: You will need to go into the game properties by right clicking on the icon. then go to the compatibility tab where you can tell the game to run in Windows XP then click apply. To insure that it follows your wishes you should re-start Windows.

context: Do we need to buy a "joystick" type device to play or just use the mouse?
response: You do not need anything but your computer. The keypad or mouse can do all that is needed.

context: How do I know if this drive is the correct on for my Wii console?
response: T drives were the same throughout the Original Wii's life, it was changed with the Wii mini.

context: Dose it work on MacBook Air?
response: It should! Check the system requirements to be sure. It does need a disc drive though so you'll need to get an external one if you don't have one already.

context: I bought Play 101 Games for an XP op sys.  Does anyone know whether they will work on Windows 8?  Box only says 7, XP & Vista.
response: Yes, but for some games you have to use the compatibility feature. Super easy takes about 3 minutes or less.

context: does it fit to the ps4?
response: Yes it fits! Only problem I experienced is that I had to trim the inner part a bit so it wouldn't rub against the insides of the controller. The part where the thumbstick will be attached to, a small squared box.

context: Do you still have access to the memory card and game card slots without taking off the grip?
response: Agree with other comments...you can get to the memory card, but it's easier just to take off the grip.  It's easy as the breeze, though, so don't let that be a deal-breaker.  Thanks.

context: is thi compatible to windows 7 home premium
What are the teams like? Are there only Test teams, and who are the players?
response: Don Bradman Cricket 14 includes 79 teams within the game, most of which are unlicensed. There international and domestic teams (current generation) historical teams and future generation teams. There are 17 international teams, 6 Australian domestic teams, 18 English domestic, along with "All time best" teams and "historical" teams.

context: Will I be able to continue from where I left of in the disc version of the game (which is now unreadable) or do I have to start all over again?
response: You will be able to continue, as your Xbox still has you save data assigned to Skyrim.

context: Does this come with a cord or is it strictly bluetooth
response: They come with a cord. The cord charges them and if like me, you sometimes play til they die you can still play with the cord plugged in.
